title: "CS is more important than kills"
body:
"A 10-0-0 person with 0 CS has the same gold amount as a 0-0-0 with 100 cs"

True, but a 10-0-0 person:
-gets their teammates gold in the form of assists
-gets themself kill gold
-gets enemies off the map so their teammates can push towers and secure objectives like dragon
-denies enemies experience and CS as well as more kills
-turns teamfights into their teams favor

a 0-0-0 person with 100 cs:
-gets gold for himself

And for people who say "what if you have both". Unless your laning opponent keeps getting solo killed over and over again while you're CSing and killing him at the same time, you're going to have to sacrifice CS to roam and get those kills.
